long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Proview Browser Plugin is engineered to seamlessly integrate with online assessment platforms, specifically tailored for Talview customers using the Proview proctoring solution. This plugin facilitates a secure and efficient remote testing environment, ensuring the integrity of the examination process.
Functionality:
- Seamless D2L Assessment Configuration: Allows educators and administrators to effortlessly set up and customize assessments within the D2L learning platform.
- Remote Proctoring Enablement: Equips proctors with the necessary tools to supervise assessments in real time, regardless of the test taker’s location.
- Real-Time Monitoring: Utilizes advanced analytics and monitoring capabilities to track and analyze test taker activity during exams, delivering alerts in the event of suspicious behavior.
- Tab Activity Assurance: Employs focus tracking technology to ensure test takers remain on the active assessment tab, preventing any attempts to access unauthorized materials.
- User-Friendly Interface: Designed with simplicity in mind, the plugin provides straightforward navigation and operation for both test creators and takers.

Ideal for a wide range of online assessments, including:
- Higher Education Exams
- Certification and Licensing Tests
- Corporate Training Evaluations
- And more…
The Proview Browser Plugin stands as a testament to our dedication to facilitating fair and secure online examinations, delivering peace of mind to educators, administrators, and test takers alike.
